item.title: A Gentle Guide to Cosmos: Three Varieties for Joyful, Wild Gardens
item.description:
A Gentle Guide to Cosmos

Three Varieties for Joyful, Wild Gardens

There are flowers you plant for structure—neat rows, symmetrical beds, control.
And then there are flowers like Cosmos — planted for joy, for the breeze, for the softness they bring to a space.

Cosmos flowers feel like freedom.
They sway with the wind, bloom without fuss, and remind us that beauty doesn’t need permission. Whether you’re gardening on a city balcony or in a wild field, Cosmos meets you there — offering light, color, and a gentle kind of wildness.
